summary: An ER doctor teams up with an assassination target to rescue his wife, held hostage by corrupt criminals and, in the process, uncovers a conspiracy.
cast: Seung-ryong Ryu|Joon-Sang Yoo|Jin-wook Lee|Sung-ryung Kim|Yeo-jeong Jo|Eun-ji Jo|Jin Guo|Lim Il-Gyu|Dae-Myung Kim|Jong-goo Kim|Hyun-Wook Lee
title: The target: El objetivo
